blog_title: Here Are 7 Delicacies To Satiate Those Summer Cravings Before The Season Comes To A Close
blog_content: May is coming to an end but the summer heat is still at its peak. Mumbai has started to see a few cloudy days and some parts have even experienced a little drizzle owing to the rains in South-India so we can expect summer to come to a close soon.

blog_title: 5 new ice cream flavours to elevate your dessert menu this summer
blog_content: Digging into that scoop of cold, delicious ice cream is one of the greatest pleasures of life. Any party is incomplete without a soothing array of desserts, mostly ice creams.

blog_title: This Thanksgiving Day, surprise your loved ones with these 5 gifts
blog_content: Thanksgiving is just around the corner and itâ€™s likely that many of us are on the lookout for gifts for our loved ones. And chances are, we might not know what to give them.

name: Cookies N Cream
description: Cookies N' Cream ice cream on a rich belgian chocolate brownie crust, loaded with chocolate chips and chocolate sauce. A slice of everything nice.

name: Cotton Candy Ice Cream Rocks
description: Playful bite-sized Cotton Candy ice cream coated with raspberry flavoured White Choco-dip

name: Fresh Very Berry Strawberry Ice cream
description: Sublime Strawberry ice cream with real strawberry pieces. This Strawberry ice cream is a childhood favourite. Scrap that actually, it?s an all time favourite! (Contains Milk)

name: Cheesecake with Lotus Biscoff Ice Cream and Butterscotch Sauce
description: Baked cheesecake with Lotus Biscoff ice cream, caramel sauce, and whipped cream. Unexpectedly delightful!

name: Chocolate Truffle Cake
description: The signature BR Bavarian chocolate ice cream sandwiched between gooey chocolate sponge cakes. Decorated with decadent milk and dark chocolate swirls and cigars. Highly recommend this chocolate therapy!

name: Italian Wafer Sandwich - Vanilla
description: Crunchy. Creamy. Irresistible. Classic Vanilla ice cream wrapped in perfectly golden brown Italian wafer crisps dipped in a rich hot fudge sauce. Sprinkled with coloured sprinkles or chopped almonds- your choice. Divine, indeed.

name: Mermaid Sundae
description: Chocolate mermaid toppers with multicolored sprinkles on your choice of ice cream. A fairytale sundae!

name: Pralines 'N Cream
description: Vanilla Ice Cream loaded with praline pecans on a rich belgian chocolate brownie crust and topped with pecan pralines and caramel sauce. Pizza just got a whole new meaning.

name: Berry Bubble Super-Duper Thickshake
description: The talk of the town ? a unique thickshake packed with flavour and crunch and made with creamy vanilla ice cream and Lotus Biscoff. Crowned with a whipped cream swirl and lotus biscuit crumble. A must try!
